message.content:
AGENT 7: BUILD TESTER (Public-Site) + CSS Generator

**Mission:** Verify public-site builds and CSS generation works

**Working Dir:** /home/claude-flow/packages/public-site

**Tests:**

1. Test CSS Generation:
```bash
npm run generate:css 2>&1 | tee /tmp/css-gen.log
echo "CSS Gen Exit Code: $?"
ls -lh public/static-master-controller.css
head -20 public/static-master-controller.css
```

2. Verify CSS content:
```bash
grep -c "@font-face" public/static-master-controller.css
grep -c "\.text-" public/static-master-controller.css
wc -l public/static-master-controller.css
```

3. TypeScript check:
```bash
npm run typecheck 2>&1 | tee /tmp/public-typecheck.log
echo "TypeCheck Exit Code: $?"
```

4. Static export build:
```bash
rm -rf .next out
time npm run build 2>&1 | tee /tmp/public-build.log
echo "Build Exit Code: $?"
```

5. Verify export output:
```bash
ls -lh out/_next/static/css/ | head -10
du -sh out/
find out/ -name "*master-controller.css" -ls
```

**Success Criteria:**
- CSS generation exit code: 0
- Generated CSS file > 5KB
- TypeCheck exit code: 0
- Build exit code: 0
- out/ directory exists
- No "Module not found" errors

**If Any Test Fails:**
- Capture full error
- STOP and report for rollback

**Output:** BUILD_PASS or BUILD_FAIL with details. Include CSS file size and export size.

{
  "name": "@saa/shared",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Shared components and utilities for SAA projects",
  "private": true,
  "main": "./lib/index.ts",
  "types": "./lib/index.ts",
  "exports": {
    "./components/saa": "./components/saa/index.ts",
    "./components/saa/*": "./components/saa/*.tsx",
    "./components/ui": "./components/ui/index.ts",
    "./components/ui/*": "./components/ui/*.tsx",
    "./lib/*": "./lib/*.ts",
    "./lib/typography": "./lib/typography/index.ts",
    "./lib/supabase": "./lib/supabase/index.ts",
    "./lib/wordpress": "./lib/wordpress/index.ts",
    "./lib/utils": "./lib/utils.ts",
    "./hooks/*": "./hooks/*.ts",
    "./types/*": "./types/*.ts",
    "./master-controller": "./master-controller/index.ts"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "react": "^19.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.2.0",
    "next": "^16.0.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@radix-ui/react-alert-dialog": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-avatar": "^1.1.10",
    "@radix-ui/react-checkbox": "^1.3.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-dialog": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu": "^2.1.16",
    "@radix-ui/react-label": "^2.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-navigation-menu": "^1.2.14",
    "@radix-ui/react-progress": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-radio-group": "^1.3.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-select": "^2.2.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-switch": "^1.2.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-tabs": "^1.1.13",
    "@supabase/ssr": "^0.7.0",
    "@supabase/supabase-js": "^2.58.0",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "date-fns": "^4.1.0",
    "framer-motion": "^12.23.22",
    "lucide-react": "^0.544.0",
    "tailwind-merge": "^2.6.0",
    "tailwindcss-animate": "^1.0.7",
    "three": "^0.120.0",
    "zod": "^4.1.11"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^22.10.2",
    "@types/react": "^19.0.1",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.0.2",
    "eslint": "^9.17.0",
    "eslint-config-next": "^15.1.3",
    "typescript": "^5.7.2"
  }
}

### Recommended Fixes (Priority Order)

#### **Option 1: Relative Imports (Quickest - 2 min)**
```typescript
// Change in app/layout.tsx
import { generateStaticCSS } from '../../shared/master-controller';
```
**Pros:** Immediate fix, no config changes  
**Cons:** Breaks monorepo encapsulation pattern

#### **Option 2: TypeScript Path Mapping (5 min)**
```json
// Add to packages/public-site/tsconfig.json
{
  "paths": {
    "@saa/shared/master-controller": ["../shared/master-controller"]
  }
}
```
**Pros:** Maintains package pattern, explicit mapping  
**Cons:** Requires testing Turbopack compatibility

#### **Option 3: Build Shared Package First (15 min)**
```bash
cd packages/shared && npm run build
# Update package.json exports to dist/ output
```
**Pros:** Industry standard, Turbopack compatible  
**Cons:** Adds build step to workflow
